name: Azure Infinity Penthouse
description: Stunning oceanfront penthouse with panoramic views of Biscayne Bay. Features 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, private elevator, marble floors, and a wraparound terrace with infinity pool.

name: Emerald Bay Estate
description: Luxurious waterfront estate on exclusive Star Island. Boasts 6 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, chef's kitchen, wine cellar, private dock, and lush tropical landscaping with pool and spa.

name: Platinum Skyline Tower
description: Modern architectural masterpiece in Coral Gables. Features 5 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, floor-to-ceiling windows, smart home technology, rooftop terrace, and resort-style amenities.

name: Ocean Pearl Villa
description: Elegant Mediterranean villa in prestigious Pinecrest. Offers 7 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, grand foyer, gourmet kitchen, library, tennis court, and meticulously manicured gardens.

name: Crystal Waters Residence
description: Ultra-modern condo in the heart of Brickell. Features 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, Italian kitchen, floor-to-ceiling glass walls, private balcony with city and bay views.

name: Golden Palms Mansion
description: Spectacular beachfront mansion in Golden Beach. Includes 8 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, grand ballroom, home theater, gym, spa, private beach access, and guest house.

name: Diamond Crest Penthouse
description: Sophisticated high-rise residence in Aventura. Boasts 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, marble finishes, gourmet kitchen, wraparound balcony, and access to world-class amenities.

name: Sapphire Shores Penthouse
description: Exclusive Fisher Island penthouse with unobstructed ocean views. Features 5 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, private rooftop terrace, marble bathrooms, and access to private beach club.

name: Sunset Paradise Estate
description: Magnificent Coconut Grove estate surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Offers 6 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, grand staircase, wine room, pool pavilion, and private marina access.

name: Miami Breeze Waterfront
description: Contemporary waterfront masterpiece in Bay Harbor Islands. Features 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, open-concept design, infinity pool, private dock, and stunning sunset views.

name: Royal Oaks Mansion
description: Majestic estate with private tennis court and yacht dock. Features 9 bedrooms, 11 bathrooms, grand ballroom, wine cellar, spa, and panoramic bay views.

name: Venetian Dreams Palace
description: Opulent waterfront palace with Italian marble throughout. Includes 7 bedrooms, 9 bathrooms, private elevator, infinity pool, and exclusive beach access.

name: Starlight Towers Penthouse
description: Ultra-luxury penthouse with 360-degree views. Boasts 6 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, private rooftop pool, smart home automation, and helicopter landing pad.

name: Coral Reef Sanctuary
description: Boutique oceanfront condo with private beach cabana. Features 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, gourmet kitchen, marble finishes, and stunning sunrise views.

name: Moonlight Bay Estate
description: Sophisticated waterfront estate with private marina. Offers 5 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, wine tasting room, gym, spa, and tropical outdoor entertainment area.

name: Prestige Point Villa
description: Architectural masterpiece with panoramic ocean views. Features 6 bedrooms, 8 bathrooms, infinity pool, private beach access, and world-class amenities.

name: Serenity Cove Penthouse
description: Tranquil penthouse surrounded by lush greenery. Includes 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, private terrace garden, meditation room, and marina access.

name: Imperial Heights Tower
description: Luxurious high-rise with resort-style amenities. Features 4 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, private pool deck, concierge service, and breathtaking ocean panoramas.

name: Paradise Crest Mansion
description: Exclusive mansion with private golf course access. Boasts 8 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, grand library, home theater, tennis court, and private helipad.
